::Dark Lavacons::

          The Dark Lavacons watched all that was going o=
n with these preds and their enemies.  They felt an instant urge to fire wh=
en some other bots approached Starscream.  Funny............Starscream was =
somewhat of a friend........Naaa.  This wasn't the way of the Dark Lavacons=
.  Astral flew up in the air, pulled out his dark flame missile launcher an=
d fired a few blasts at Hell Beast and Waspinator(and anyother preds on the=
ir side).

        Fenox started firing his dark flamethrowers at Waspinato=
r and Hell Beast, laughing madly.

        Starlight fired a direct shot fr=
om her dark flame crossbow at the back of Waspinator's head.

         Grip=
lash grabbed his dark lavablade, jumped up into the air, and came slashing =
it down at Hell Beast's shoulder.

         Recklessa watched for a moment =
and laughed, as she started spraying shots from her darkflame gatling gun a=
t Hell Beast and the other intruders.
